events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will begin review shortly.
Your application has been categorized under engineering roles since you specified experience in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering positions has been assigned to your application and will be in touch soon.
The initial screening went very well, your background in software development aligns with the job requirements.
Thank you for the update. I am excited to move forward and look forward to the next steps in the interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for March 10th at 2 PM UTC with our senior engineering team.
The technical interview was completed successfully. Your knowledge of system architecture and coding was highly impressive.
Following your technical interview, an HR interview has been scheduled for March 14th at 11 AM UTC.
Your HR interview was positive, and the team is pleased with your cultural fit and communication skills.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the software engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits.
I am grateful for the offer and very happy with the proposed terms. I am looking forward to joining the team.
The candidate has formally accepted the offer and confirmed their start date as April 1st.
Onboarding process has started with document submissions and initial training schedules being communicated.
The hiring process is complete, and the new software engineer has officially joined the engineering team.
